劼字的基本解释

劼
jié
慎重。
稳固。
勤勉。

劼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jié］
［《廣韻》恪八切，入黠，溪。］
［《集韻》喫吉切，入質，溪。］
(1)谨慎。参见“劼毖”。
(2)勤，尽力。

劼字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【力字部】　劼； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页147第16
【唐韻】恪八切【集韻】【韻會】丘八切，?慳入聲。【說文】愼也。从力，吉聲。【書·酒誥】汝劼毖殷獻臣。【註】汝當用力戒謹殷之賢臣，使不湎于酒也。又【爾雅·釋詁】劼，固也。【疏】劼者，確固也。又【集韻】訖黠切，音戛。【博雅】勤也。又【集韻】喫吉切，音詰。義同。

劼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
劼字的起名意思

：谨慎、慎重；牢固、稳固；勤勉。

Jie
Basic explanation of words
Jie
jié
careful.
stable.
diligent.
Jie
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jié］
["Guangyun" Ke eight cuts, into the point, the stream. ]
["Jiyun" eats auspicious and cuts, enters the quality, the stream. ]
(1) Be cautious. See "劼毖".
(2) Diligence and hard work.
Jie
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [Li Zi Department] 　劼; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 147-16
[Tang Yun] Ke eight-cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Qiu eight-cut, save the sound. [Said Wen] Shu Ye. Congli, Jisheng. 【Book·Liquor】Rujieya Yin Xianchen. [Note] You should vigorously guard against the virtuous ministers, so that you don't get caught up in wine. Also 【Erya·Shigu】劼, it is solid. 【Sparse】The person who is suicidal is indeed solid. [Jiyun] also cut, sound canned. [Bo Ya] Qin also. Also 【Jiyun】Eat Jiqie, sound interrogation. The same meaning.
Jie
